column2: "Na ɔhen no na Haman baa dɛ wɔnye Ɔhembaa Ester robɔto pon."

column3: wɔ nsa aponto no ho dɛ
column5: w'adzeserɛ nye dɛn? Na wɔmfa mma wo: na w'ahwehwɛdze nye dɛn? Odu ahendzi yi ne fa mpo a

column6: ma wɔmfa mo nkwa mma me wɔ adzeserɛ yi do

column5: nkuku hɛn. Na sɛ wɔtontɔɔn hɛn yɛɛ nkowaa na mfonabaa a
column7: naaso ɔtamfo no runntum nnhyɛ ɔhen n'adze a ɔbɛsɛɛ no ananmu."

column2: "Nna ɔhen Ahasuerus buae see ɔhembaa Ester dɛ
column5: na n'akoma ara ahyɛ no mu ma dɛ ɔbɛyɛ dɛm no?"

column4: mekyerɛ Haman otsiɔdzennyi yi a. Nna Haman n'akoma tui wɔ ɔhen no na ɔhembaa no enyim."

column2: "Na ɔhen no soɛree wɔ n'ebufuw no mu fii nsa aponto no ho
column3: na osii mu kɔr ahemfi ture no mu; na Haman soɛree gyinaa dɛ ɔrepa no nkwa ho kyɛw wɔ ɔhembaa Ester hɔ
column4: osiandɛ ohun dɛ ɔhen no abɔ no ho pɔw bɔn."

column2: "Nna ɔhen no sanee fii ahemfie ture no mu baa beebi mbrɛ nsa pon no wɔ no; nna Haman ahwe adamu egua a Ester wɔ do no do. Nna ɔhen no see dɛ
column3: Ana mpo orubotu ahyɛ ɔhembaa do so wɔ m'enyim wɔ ofi yi mu? Aber a asɛm no fii ɔhen no n'anomu puei ara
epiafo a wɔwɔ ɔhen no n'enyim no mu baako no
column6: dua a Haman ayɛ ama Modekai a ɔkaa ɔhen no ho asɛmpa no
column8: ne tsentsen yɛ basafa eduonu enum. Na ɔhen no see dɛ

column2: "Nna wɔsɛɛn Haman wɔ dua a oesiesie ama Modekai no do. Nna ɔhen no n'ebufuw ano dwee."
